name: Bait!
description:
Join the more than 2 million players who already enjoy Bait!
You’re invited to Bait! Island to help catch a rare fish for your boss and thereby save the struggling aquarium where you work.
While playing the game, you will catch a lot of different fish and make friends with the locals. But, will you be able to keep your loyalties both to your new friends and to your boss?
Gameplay spans five different lakes, each with a distinct style and its own unique set of fishes. Can you catch them all?
Use your controller to take control of your fishing rod in this hit VR game available for the Lenovo Mirage Solo or Daydream View VR headsets!
